title: Bart Gets an F
synopsis: Bart fails four history tests and studies hard with Martin's help to avoid repeating fourth grade.

title: Simpson and Delilah
synopsis: Homer secretly uses a hair-growth product to look younger and gets promoted, but his new assistant Karl steals his idea and his confidence.

title: Treehouse of Horror
synopsis: In a Halloween trilogy, the family lives in a haunted house, aliens capture Homer and Kang, and Bart reads a cursed raven poem.

title: Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish
synopsis: After Bart catches a three-eyed fish near the plant, Burns runs for governor and tries to use the Simpsons for a public-relations dinner stunt.

title: Dancin' Homer
synopsis: Homer becomes mascot for the Springfield Isotopes, then takes the family to Capital City when offered a major-league mascot job.

title: Dead Putting Society
synopsis: Homer and Ned's rivalry escalates after Bart and Todd compete in a mini-golf tournament.

title: Bart vs. Thanksgiving
synopsis: After ruining Lisa's centerpiece and running away, Bart learns gratitude and returns home on Thanksgiving.

title: Bart the Daredevil
synopsis: Inspired by stuntman Lance Murdock, Bart attempts a dangerous skateboard jump at Springfield Gorge.

title: Itchy & Scratchy & Marge
synopsis: Marge campaigns against cartoon violence after Maggie imitates it, leading to censorship backlash and irony when she defends Michelangelo's David.

title: Bart Gets Hit by a Car
synopsis: Burns hits Bart with his car and hires Lionel Hutz to settle, but the family's courtroom greed makes them lose the case.

title: One Fish, Two Fish, Blowfish, Blue Fish
synopsis: Believing he will die after eating poisoned pufferfish, Homer spends a day saying goodbye to everyone he loves.

title: The Way We Was
synopsis: Homer and Marge tell the kids how they met in high school and eventually fell in love after a complicated prom night.

title: Homer vs. Lisa and the 8th Commandment
synopsis: When Homer gets illegal cable, Lisa's moral concerns push him to choose conscience over free premium channels.

title: Principal Charming
synopsis: Marge tries to set Selma up with Principal Skinner, but Patty's interference and Skinner's confusion derail the match.

title: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?
synopsis: Homer meets his rich half-brother Herb, who puts him in charge of designing a car that disastrously fails.

title: Bart's Dog Gets an F
synopsis: After Santa's Little Helper misbehaves, Bart trains him for obedience school to keep the family from giving him up.

title: Old Money
synopsis: Grampa inherits money from his late girlfriend and donates it to renovate the retirement home with a local hero's name.

title: Brush with Greatness
synopsis: Marge revives her painting talent and is commissioned to paint Mr. Burns, while Homer feels overshadowed by his own failures.

title: Lisa's Substitute
synopsis: Lisa bonds with substitute teacher Mr. Bergstrom and copes with disappointment when he leaves Springfield.

title: The War of the Simpsons
synopsis: Homer and Marge attend a marriage retreat, where Homer sneaks out to fish and catches the legendary General Sherman.

title: Three Men and a Comic Book
synopsis: Bart, Milhouse, and Martin jointly buy a rare Radioactive Man comic, but paranoia and greed threaten their friendship.

title: Blood Feud
synopsis: After Bart gives Burns a blood transfusion, Burns offers a reward and Homer obsesses over getting recognition.
